description: Replaces the given percentage of Dive Balls, Net Balls, and Lure Balls with 'Failed Catch Traps'.
When received, a Failed Catch Trap forces you to flee from your current (or next) encounter.
Makes it so that items are rewarded each time a species is caught in a new area.
For example, this means you get an item for catching a Magikarp in New Bark Town,
another item for catching a Magikarp in Cherrygrove City, and so on.
The extra locations also result in more important items being shuffled into the pool,
including locking the use of repels, status ailments in battle, both fishing abilities separately,
the Bicycle, and an extra key item to match an otherwise irrelevant vanilla progression blocker.
Effectively adds an additional 182 checks when enabled.
